info.title: Rotary API
info.description: API for Rotary Club orthosis loan management system.

post.description: Creates a new applicant in the system.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all applicants in the system.
Retrieves an applicant from the system by their unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates an existing applicant's information in the system.

409.description: Conflict occurred while updating the applicant.

delete.description: Deletes an existing applicant from the system by their unique identifier.

post.description: Logs in a user with email and password. Returns an access token if successful.

parameters.name: useCookies
parameters.description: Set to true to use persistent cookies for authentication. Mutually exclusive with useSessionCookies.

parameters.name: useSessionCookies
parameters.description: Set to true to use session-only cookies for authentication. Mutually exclusive with useCookies.

post.description: Logs out the currently authenticated user. Invalidates the access token and removes the session.
Creates a new user with the provided details. Returns the created user ID if successful.

get.description: Retrieves the currently authenticated user details.

patch.description: Updates the details of the currently authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users in the system.
Retrieves a user by their ID.

delete.description: Deletes a user by their ID.

get.description: Retrieves all users for a specific orthopedic bank.

post.description: Creates a new dependent in the system.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all dependents in the system.
Retrieves a dependent from the system by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates an existing dependent in the system.

delete.description: Deletes a dependent from the system by its unique identifier.

post.description: Creates a new item in the system.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all items in the system.
Retrieves an item from the system by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing item in the system.

delete.description: Deletes an item from the system by its unique identifier.

get.description: Retrieves a list of items associated with a specific stock ID.

post.description: Creates a new loan in the system.

example.message: An error occurred while processing your request

409.description: Item is not available for loan

example.message: Item is not available for loan

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request.

example.message: An error occurred while processing your request

get.description: Retrieves a list of all loans in the system.
Retrieves a loan from the system by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing loan in the system.

example.message: An error occurred while processing your request

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request.

example.message: An error occurred while processing your request

delete.description: Deletes a loan from the system by its unique identifier.

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request.

example.message: An error occurred while processing your request

post.description: Creates a new orthopedic bank in the system.

example.message: An orthopedic bank with this name already exists

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all orthopedic banks in the system.

get.summary: Get an orthopedic bank by ID
get.description: Retrieves an orthopedic bank from the system by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates an existing orthopedic bank in the system.

example.message: An orthopedic bank with this name already exists

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request.

delete.description: Deletes an existing orthopedic bank from the system.

400.description: Orthopedic bank cannot be deleted because it has associated stock/items.

post.description: Creates a new stock in the system. This endpoint accepts form-data with the following fields: Title (required), OrthopedicBankId (required), and ImageFile (optional).

404.description: Orthopedic bank with ID not found.

example.message: Orthopedic Bank with is Id not found

get.description: Retrieves all stocks from the system.
Retrieves a stock from the system by its unique identifier.

patch.description: Updates an existing stock in the system. This endpoint accepts form-data with the following optional fields: Title, ImageFile, MaintenanceQtd, AvailableQtd, and BorrowedQtd.

delete.description: Deletes an existing stock from the system.

get.description: Retrieves all stocks for a specific orthopedic bank.

enum: MAINTENANCE (The item is under maintenance and cannot be used.)
AVAILABLE (The item is available for use.)
UNAVAILABLE (The item is currently unavailable for use.)
LOST (The item has been lost and cannot be recovered.)
DONATED (The item has been donated and is no longer part of the inventory.)

message.description: Message providing additional information about the operation

isBeneficiary.description: Indicator if the applicant is a beneficiary

dependents.description: Array of dependents associated with the applicant

stockId.description: Unique identifier of the stock associated with the item

isActive.description: Indicates whether the loan is active
Indicates whether the loan is active

item.description: Identifier of the item being loaned

id.description: Unique identifier of the orthopedic bank

createdAt.description: Creation date of the orthopedic bank

orthopedicBankId.description: Unique identifier of the orthopedic bank

ApiKey.description: API Key needed to access the endpoints. ApiKey: X-Api-Key
ApiKey.name: x-api-key
